page.title: 15A County Councillor.
page.content: This councillor has done a lot for {Colburn},introducing{Fair Play {for Kids},giving them new play equipment,a toy library and he's been involved in renovating{Beckwood council housing estate.He's now working on securing land for a B.M.X. cycle track.He goes to{Northallerton for his council meetings.The biggest thing he would like to see is more young people being employed in the future.He would like to divide a big workshop into several small workshops where various skills are taught and young people can choose jobs.He is on {Social Services}and{Planning committees.He has lots of phone calls and letters from people wanting help.It is hard work but fun.He likes reading,walking and swimming in his spare time.His main hobby is bee keeping.(C.Austin, A.Stevens)
